resources.string: Do you really want to enable logging? If an adversary gains access to the application password, they could view data about deleted data. It is highly recommended to enable logs only for application testing.
Enter timeout for log auto-deletion (in days)
Logs older than N days will be cleared to free space.
Do you want to clear logs?
Logs for day %1$s will be cleared.
You can read logs here if they are enabled. Logs show when the application was unlocked and what data was deleted. Logs are deleted automatically after 7 days, but you can change this behavior.
